alert.note: Alert for Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:38PM EDT until July 19 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 638 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pocotaligo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Yemassee, Hendersonville, Dale, Gardens Corner, Sheldon, Pocotaligo and White Hall. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 33 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
